remarks: ` DVecH ` vector space closed subspace join in terms of lattice join. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2014.)
statement:
djhj.k $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
djhj.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhj.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhj.j $e |- J = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhj.w $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhj.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ran I ) $.
djhj.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ran I ) $.
djhj $p |- ( ph -> ( `' I ` ( X J Y ) ) = ( ( `' I ` X ) .\/ ( `' I ` Y ) ) ) $.
